title: Graduation Thesis
overview: Graduation Thesis is an independent research project that evaluates students' knowledge and abilities accumulated during their studies and their ability to apply this knowledge in practice.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Understanding and applying knowledge to complete professional tasks and solve basic problems in the insurance field
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will understand and apply knowledge to complete professional tasks and solve basic problems in the insurance field; have knowledge and skills to implement, analyze, monitor, and evaluate various types of insurance, processes, and development policies and strategies of insurance organizations and businesses.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Synthesizing, analyzing, and systematic thinking skills; ability to organize and manage resources for professional management activities in insurance business
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will have synthesizing, analyzing, and systematic thinking skills; ability to organize and manage resources for professional management activities in insurance business.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Ability to work independently, express personal opinions and critique based on an objective and scientific approach; professional attitude, confidence, and cooperation in work; personal responsibility, responsibility towards the work group, community, and society
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will have the ability to work independently, express personal opinions and critique based on an objective and scientific approach; professional attitude, confidence, and cooperation in work; understanding of laws and professional ethics, personal responsibility, responsibility towards the work group, community, and society.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Knowledge and skills in planning, coordinating, managing resources, evaluating, and improving the effectiveness of activities in insurance organizations and businesses
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will have knowledge and skills in planning, coordinating, managing resources, evaluating, and improving the effectiveness of activities in insurance organizations and businesses; can propose solutions for specific issues in the insurance field raised by practical situations in the internship organization.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Organizing, evaluating, supervising, and inspiring members in performing assigned tasks and social activities
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will organize, evaluate, supervise, and inspire members in performing assigned tasks and social activities.
